mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.floor,c.deviation, d.name place FROM staticaccuracy a left join maps b on a.mapId = b.mapId left join store d on a.placeId = d.id left join estimatedev c on b.mapId = c.mapId ORDER BY ${sortCol} ${sortDir} LIMIT #{start},#{length}

SELECT a.*,b.floor,c.deviation, d.name place FROM staticaccuracy a left join maps b on a.mapId = b.mapId left join store d on a.placeId = d.id left join estimatedev c on b.mapId = c.mapId WHERE a.start_date > #{startTime} and a.end_date < #{endTime}

SELECT a.*,b.floor,c.deviation, d.name place FROM staticaccuracy a left join maps b on a.mapId = b.mapId left join store d on a.placeId = d.id left join estimatedev c on b.mapId = c.mapId WHERE a.placeId = #{storeid} ORDER BY ${sortCol} ${sortDir} LIMIT #{start},#{length}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staticaccuracy( triggerIp, placeId, floorNo, mapId, origin, destination, start_date, end_date, avgeOffset, maxOffset, staicAccuracy, offsetCenter, offsetNumber, stability, count_3, count_5, count_10, count_10p, detail ) VALUES ( #{triggerIp}, #{store.id}, #{map.floorNo}, #{map.mapId}, #{origin}, #{destination}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{avgeOffset}, #{maxOffset}, #{staicAccuracy}, #{offsetCenter}, #{offsetNumber}, #{stability}, #{count3}, #{count5}, #{count10}, #{count10p}, #{detail} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.name place,d.floor,c.deviation FROM staticaccuracy a left join store b on a.placeId = b.id left join maps d on a.mapId = d.mapId left join estimatedev c on a.mapId = c.mapId
